formatted_address: 18 Marina Gardens Dr, #01-01 Active Garden, Waterfront Plaza, Singapore 018953
name: Starbucks Active Garden

reviews.text:
A newly open starbuck not far from marina bay sands.

I won't say it is quiet nor packed but at least u can find a seats and drink coffee to enjoy scenery. There is a playground beside the  Starbucks. U can drink  coffee beside the playground at the open space.

This is the second outlet opened near Active Garden in Gardens by the Bay. Unfortunately the outdoor area was invaded by birds hunting for food and they would aggressively snatch your food the moment you stepped out from the aircon to the outdoor area. The service staff shared that they had written to the management several times but no help was given to them.  Birds were seen on tables, signages and bins posing hygiene issues.

First Time came here with hubby, it was a nice & relaxing environment.
I had the Christmas versions of the cake & both of us have the Christmas version drinks it’s nice and it’s 1 for 1 for Starbucks Membership.
This is my fav Starbucks location at outdoor gardens by the bay. It's perfect when you go on your walk at the gardens and finish up with a nice coffee and chilling. Very nice place to hang out.
I love how chill this outlet is and the views are great. Staff are friendly and area is clean. I’ll come back again for sure. Love how it’s pet friendly as well.

vicinity: 18 Marina Gardens Drive, #01-01 Active Garden, Waterfront Plaza
